name: Global uniques
uniques: May buy [Great Prophet] units for [200] [Faith] [in all cities] at an increasing price ([250])
May not generate great prophet equivalents naturally
[-50]% growth [in all cities] <when between [-10] and [0] Happiness>
Nullifies Growth [in all cities] <when below [-10] Happiness>
[+1] Unit Supply per [2] population [in all cities]
[+1 Happiness] [in all cities connected to capital]
Rebel units may spawn <when below [-1] Happiness>
